smartgov.urban.osm.simulation.scenario

Class OsmScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartgov.core.simulation.Scenario
      • smartgov.urban.osm.simulation.scenario.OsmScenario
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScenarioVisualization

    public abstract class OsmScenario
extends Scenario
    Abstract base for OSM scenarios. Define functions to load OSM features parsed by the SmartGov OSMParser, and to add the to the Repast Simphony context. Such features include : - OsmNodes - OsmArcs - Buildings (Homes and WorkOffices) - Parking Spots

      • buildArcs

        public java.util.Collection<Arc> buildArcs(SmartGovContext context)
        Description copied from class: Scenario

      • createArc

        public abstract OsmArc createArc(java.lang.String id,
                                 Road road,
                                 OsmNode startNode,
                                 OsmNode targetNode,
                                 int lanes,
                                 java.lang.String type)
        This function behaves has an arc factory. It is called by the OSMparser to generate an arc from the OSM data, that are represented by the arguments of this function. It can be overridden by sub-scenarios to generate other OsmArcs types, but without altering the parsing functions.
        Parameters:
        geography - Current Geometry
        id - Arc id
        road - Road to which the Arc belongs to.
        startNode - Start Node
        targetNode - Target Node
        distance - Length of the Arc
        polyLine - Shape of the Arc
        lanes - Number of OSM lanes
        type - Arc type. (OSM 'highway' attribute)
        Returns:
        Created OsmArc
